Class BSStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • BSStrategy

  • public class BSStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing methods for choosing battle ship moves with basic strategy.
    Author:
    justin

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomMove

        public static Move getRandomMove()
        Generates a random Move.
        Returns:
        Random move.

      • getLocalMove

        public static Move getLocalMove(Move move,
                Board board)
        Select a move that neighbors current move, return invalid Move if none are available.
        Parameters:
        move - Coordinates being evaluated.
        board - Board being evaluated.
        Returns:
        Returns a move that is directly North, South, East, or West of current Move.

      • continueStreak

        public static Move continueStreak(Move prevMove,
                  Board board,
                  int d)
        Continue streak is method used when computer has made multiple successful shots in a row. Computer will traverse this path in search for the next valid move.
        Parameters:
        board - Game board being fired on.
        prevMove - The previous move being used to determine the next move.
        d - The direction (UP,DOWN,RIGHT,LEFT) to traverse for next move.
        Returns:
        The next move a long this path. Invalid move is returned if no cases match.

      • getStreakDirection

        public static int getStreakDirection(Move prev1,
                     Move prev2)
        Determine which direction to travel based off of the previous 2 moves made.
        Parameters:
        prev1 - Last move made.
        prev2 - Move before last move made.
        Returns:
        Integer value used to determine direction. (1 = North, 2 = South, 3 = East, 4 = West, 0 = No relation)
